Text.Value: Reach the other side to receive my gift.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player looks at the Shar statue before them and hear's Shar's disembodied voice

Companion SH produces a dagger in her right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

The (non-SH) player produces a dagger in their right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Avatar SH produces a dagger in her right hand and cuts their left hand with it. Contact with dagger and hand doesn't need to be seen - can just show dagger poised, then a close-up of the player wincing as the cut themselves off-camera. NOTE - dagger appears in cinematic only

Text.Value: Spill some of your blood in the bowl.
If you're going to hesitate, just stand aside and let me do the trial myself.
These trials mean something to me, don't you understand? I thought I could rely on you.
*Another bowl, bearing the stains of an ancient blood offering.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looks at a large bowl being held by a Shar statue. Close-up of a dried blood stain in the base of the bowl.

Text.Value: *The bowl contains an ancient, rust-coloured bloodstain. It forms a neat disc, as if spilled calmly and willingly.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looks at a large bowl being held by a Shar statue. Close-up of a dried blood stain in the base of the bowl.

Text.Value: *You recognise this as a trial, where initiates would prove themselves to Lady Shar. This one would put their skills of stealth and infiltration to the test.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart-only narration. Visuals should favour her here.

Text.Value: Try not to hit an artery.
*Another trial, for Lady Shar's initiates. This one would put their skills of stealth and infiltration to the test.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart-only narration. Visuals should favour her here.

Text.Value: Another trial. I should do this one as well.

EditorData.logicalname: SH asked to to a trial before

Text.Value: This is no time to indulge your pettiness. These trials are important to me.
This is one of Lady Shar's trials. Allow me - it's important.

Synopsis: For when a player interacts with the statue to begin the stealth trial in the Shar temple.
